Reviews.Title: Nice camera
Reviews.Author: Firoze Rao
Reviews.Content: All the bells and whistles to do cool stuff. You can Geo-tag photos, control the camera from your iPhone and automatically send pictures to everyone who in them.The kit is very nice, adds more cool hardware to a great product

ProductInfo.Name: Nikon COOLPIX AW110 16 MP Waterproof Digital Camera with Built-In Wi-Fi (Blue) " Ready For Adventure " Kit Bundle Includes 16GB Memory Card, Lithium Replacement Battery, Mini Table-top Tripod, Deluxe Carrying Case , Lens Cleaning Kit, and Floating Wrist S
